author: CBS News
title: Watch live: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo gives coronavirus update
description: Cuomo has announced "good news" in the virus fight but warned against complacency.
content: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo is giving an update on the state's response to the coronavirus pandemic on Thursday, a day after announcing "good news" in the state's fight against the virus. He pointed out that a decreasing number of new hospitalizations and … [+738 chars]
